question: The correct sequence in decreasing order of the four sugarcane producing States in India is?
option1: Maharashtra, U.P., Tamil Nadu, Andhra Pradesh
option2: U.P., Maharashtra, Tamil Nadu, Andhra Pradesh
option3: Maharashtra, U.P., Andhra Pradesh, Tamil Nadu
option4: U.P., Maharashtra, Andhra Pradesh, Tamil Nadu
answer: U.P., Maharashtra, Tamil Nadu, Andhra Pradesh
explanation:
The decreasing order of the sugarcane producing States in India is:
Uttar Pradesh- 132427.6842, Maharashtra- 69648.0768, Karnataka-35732, Tamil Nadu- 33919.17, Andhra Pradesh-15567
